description:
Mathematics > Standard Multiple Choice

Read the following SAT test question and then click on a button to select your answer.

Machine X, working at a constant rate, can produce x bolts per hour. Machine Y, working at a constant rate, can produce x plus 6 bolts per hour. In terms of x, how many bolts can both machines working together at their respective rates produce in 4 hours?


(A) (4 x) +12

(B) (4 x) +24

(C) (6 x) +30

(D) (8 x) +24

(E) (8 x) +36 

正确答案>>>

点击查看第二页

title: SAT I 一日一问：2014年1月29日

description:
"I think that if you keep your eyes and your ears open and you are receptive to learning, there are skills you can get from any job at all."--Cat Deeley“我认为如果你愿意看、愿意听、愿意学，你能从任何工作中学到技能。”——卡特·迪莉

"Seeking means: to have a goal; but finding means: to be free, to be receptive, to have no goal."--Herman Hesse“追求意味着有目标，但发现意味着：自由自在，放开怀抱，没有目标。”——赫尔曼·黑塞

"It is impossible to withhold education from the receptive mind, as it is impossible to force it upon the unreasoning." -Agnes Repplier“让思想开明的人不接受教育是不可能的，如同不可能在毫无道理的情况下强迫别人。”——阿格尼斯·雷普利尔

"One of the things I've learned is to be receptive of feedback." -Ben Silbermann“我学到的一件事是接受反馈。”——本·希伯尔曼

"The best way to persuade people is with your ears--by listening to them. " -Dean Rusk“说服人们的最好方式是用耳朵——倾听他们。”——迪恩·拉斯科

"Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% how I react." -John Maxwell“生活由10%的事件和90%的反应组成。”——约翰·麦克斯维尔

"The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails." -William Arthur Ward“悲观者抱怨风；乐观者希望它能改变；现实者调整船帆。”——威廉·亚瑟沃德

"Relax & clear your mind if someone is speaking, so that you're receptive to what they're saying."--Roger Ailes“有人说话时放松和理清你的头脑，这样你能接受他们的话。”——罗杰·艾尔斯

"The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity."-Emelia Earhart“最困难的事情是决定做出行动，剩下的只要坚持就好。”——阿梅莉亚·埃尔哈特

"Either you run the day, or they day runs you"-Jim Rohn“要不你控制时光，要不你被时光控制。”——吉米·罗恩

description:
沪江英乐：来自美国波士顿摇滚乐队 Lansdowne 主唱 Jon Ricci，鼓手 Glenn Mungo，吉他手 Josh Waterman，Joey Ariemma ，贝斯 Mike LaRoche，在残酷且疯狂的三年公路巡回演出里不断里宣传他们的个人首张处女作，从新录制了他们的EP并用新收录的作为主打歌曲，每首歌曲都以自传的形式来诠释他们艰辛的音乐旅程。

【美国波士顿摇滚乐队 Lansdowne 新单《One Shot》】

Three shots and she's begging me to...
